tool_description: Kiara Spam Detector classifies a given text and predicts if the text is spam or not.
name: Kiara Spam Detector v1
title: Kiara Spam Detector v1

api_list.name: predict v1
api_list.description: When given a text, the end result is  a number in [0, 1] where 1 is spam and 0 is no spam
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kiara-spam-detector-v1.p.rapidapi.com/predict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kiara-spam-detector-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
